== Thrithala (CT) (627600) ==

Thrithala (CT) is a town in the [[Ottappalam]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 21.78 sq. km. and harbouring 5879 households with total population of 27796 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 70 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 350 km. Male population is 13115 and female population is 14681. Scheduled Caste population is 5254 and Scheduled Tribes population is 19. Census Location Code of the town is 627600<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Palakkad (m) at a distance of 70 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Coimbatore(m corp. )  at a distance of 89 km. Railway station is at Pattambi at a distance of 8 km.
